user.title: Setup of DiveraControl
user.description: Please select an option for configuration.

login.title: User Login
login.description:
Please enter a username and password. These credentials are only used for the initial data query and will not be saved.
Also set the polling interval for when no alarm is active and when an alarm is ongoing.

data.update_interval_data: Polling interval when no alarm is active (seconds)

api_key.title: Enter API Key
api_key.description: If login fails or a system user should be used, the user's API key can be entered here as an alternative.

data.update_interval_data: Polling interval when no alarm is active (seconds)

multi_cluster.title: Unit Selection
multi_cluster.description: Multiple units were found for the provided user. Please select the desired unit. Additional units must be added separately.

reconfigure.title: Change Configuration for DiveraControl
reconfigure.description: By changing the API key, a different user can be assigned to the unit. Additionally, the polling intervals can be reconfigured.

data.update_interval_data: Polling interval when no alarm is active (seconds)

abort.new_data_only:
Configuration completed.

The following units were created: {new_data}
abort.existing_data_only:
Configuration completed.

The following units already exist and were not created: {existing_data}
abort.no_new_hubs_found: No new units found, so no new hubs were created.

common.usergroup_4: The logged-in user is a standard user. Access permissions depend on Divera privileges, so some data may be unavailable.
common.usergroup_5: The logged-in user is a monitor user. Access permissions depend on Divera privileges, so some data may be unavailable.
common.usergroup_8: The logged-in user is an admin user and has access to all data.
common.usergroup_14:
The logged-in user is the standard API user. Therefore, access is not possible to:
- Alarm data
- News
- Appointments
- Dashboards
common.usergroup_19:
The logged-in user is a system user and will not have access to:
- Alarm data
- News
- Appointments
common.usergroup_unknown: A user from an unknown user group {usergroup_id} has logged in. Depending on granted permissions, some data may not be available.

extra_fields.title: Title
extra_fields.notification_filter_vehicle: Only alert people on specific vehicles
extra_fields.notification_filter_status: Only alert people with specific status

api_post_vehicle_status_failed.message: Changing vehicle status and data for {vehicle_id} failed.

both_message_channel_and_alarm_id.message: Either 'message channel id' or 'alarm id' must be provided, not both.

no_message_channel_or_alarm_id.message: Either 'message channel id' or 'alarm id' must be provided.

no_message_channel.message: No message channel found for alarm id '{alarm_id}'. Check if there is a message channel for that alarm.

api_post_using_vehicle_property_failed.message: Posting vehicle properties for Vehicle-ID {vehicle_id} failed.

no_mode_provided.message: No modus chosen. Valid values are {valid_modes}.

no_crew_provided.message: No crew provided. At least one user must be specified in 'add' and 'remove' modes.

invalid_mode.message: Invalid mode '{mode}' for setting vehicle crew, must be 'add', 'remove' or 'reset'.

api_post_using_vehicle_crew_failed.message: Failed to post vehicle crew for Vehicle-ID {vehicle_id}, check logs for details.

no_news_title.message: No title provided for the news.

api_post_news_failed.message: Failed to post news, check logs for details.
